00006 #ifndef SAGA_EXPORT_DEFINITIONS_HPP
00007 #define SAGA_EXPORT_DEFINITIONS_HPP
00008 
00009 // For symbol import/export macros
00010 #include <saga/saga-defs.hpp>
00011 
00012 #if !defined (SAGA_CREATE_PREPROCESSED_FILES)
00013 
00014 # if defined(SAGA_WINDOWS)
00015 #   define SAGA_SYMBOL_EXPORT   __declspec (dllexport)
00016 #   define SAGA_SYMBOL_EXPORT_REPEAT SAGA_SYMBOL_EXPORT
00017 #   define SAGA_SYMBOL_IMPORT   __declspec (dllimport)
00018 #   define SAGA_SYMBOL_INTERNAL /* empty */
00019 # elif defined(SAGA_GCC_HAVE_VISIBILITY)
00020 #   define SAGA_SYMBOL_EXPORT   __attribute__((visibility("default")))
00021 #   define SAGA_SYMBOL_EXPORT_REPEAT 
00022 #   define SAGA_SYMBOL_IMPORT   __attribute__((visibility("default")))
00023 #   define SAGA_SYMBOL_INTERNAL __attribute__((visibility("hidden")))
00024 # else
00025 #   define SAGA_SYMBOL_EXPORT   /* empty */
00026 #   define SAGA_SYMBOL_EXPORT_REPEAT 
00027 #   define SAGA_SYMBOL_IMPORT   /* empty */
00028 #   define SAGA_SYMBOL_INTERNAL /* empty */
00029 # endif
00030 
00032 // define the export/import helper macros
00033 
00034 # ifdef     SAGA_ENGINE_EXPORTS
00035 #   define  SAGA_EXPORT             SAGA_SYMBOL_EXPORT
00036 #   define  SAGA_EXCEPTION_EXPORT   SAGA_SYMBOL_EXPORT
00037 # elif !defined(BUILD_SAGA_LITE)
00038 #   define  SAGA_EXPORT             SAGA_SYMBOL_IMPORT
00039 #   define  SAGA_EXCEPTION_EXPORT   SAGA_SYMBOL_IMPORT
00040 # else
00041 #   define  SAGA_EXPORT             /* empty */
00042 #   define  SAGA_EXCEPTION_EXPORT   /* empty */
00043 # endif
00044 
00045 # ifdef     SAGA_PACKAGE_EXPORTS
00046 #   define  SAGA_PACKAGE_EXPORT     SAGA_SYMBOL_EXPORT
00047 #   define  SAGA_PACKAGE_LOCAL      SAGA_SYMBOL_INTERNAL
00048 # elif !defined(BUILD_SAGA_LITE)
00049 #   define  SAGA_PACKAGE_EXPORT     SAGA_SYMBOL_IMPORT
00050 #   define  SAGA_PACKAGE_LOCAL      SAGA_SYMBOL_INTERNAL
00051 # else
00052 #   define  SAGA_PACKAGE_EXPORT     /* empty */
00053 #   define  SAGA_PACKAGE_LOCAL      /* empty */
00054 # endif
00055 
00056 # ifdef     SAGA_ADAPTOR_EXPORTS
00057 #   define  SAGA_ADAPTOR_EXPORT     SAGA_SYMBOL_EXPORT
00058 #   define  SAGA_ADAPTOR_LOCAL      SAGA_SYMBOL_INTERNAL
00059 # elif !defined(BUILD_SAGA_LITE)
00060 #   define  SAGA_ADAPTOR_EXPORT     SAGA_SYMBOL_IMPORT
00061 #   define  SAGA_ADAPTOR_LOCAL      SAGA_SYMBOL_INTERNAL
00062 # else
00063 #   define  SAGA_ADAPTOR_EXPORT     /* empty */
00064 #   define  SAGA_ADAPTOR_LOCAL      /* empty */
00065 # endif
00066 
00067 # define    SAGA_LOCAL              /* empty */
